description:
Lumen Technologies, a leading telecommunications firm, has recently announced significant new contracts totalling $5 billion with cloud and tech companies for its networking and cybersecurity solutions. This surge in demand comes as businesses across various sectors rapidly adopt AI-driven technologies. Among these notable agreements is a deal with Microsoft, which revealed last month its plans... Read more »

The post AI expansion drives $5B in deals for Lumen appeared first on AI News.
title: AI expansion drives $5B in deals for Lumen

description:
Amid the excitement over how AI will revolutionise healthcare, advertising, logistics, and everything else, one industry has flown under the radar: the legal profession. In fact, the business of law is a strong contender for achieving the highest return on investment (ROI) from using AI.  Law firms are seen as traditional, not as eager adopters... Read more »

The post It’s time for law firms to go all in on AI appeared first on AI News.
title: It’s time for law firms to go all in on AI
